title: Plat player searchs clan
body:
Hi everyone.

Iam searching for an clan for 5 on 5.
I am pretty good at mid and top, but can play all roles as far as the team communication is working.
Would be nice if we play at least 1 team ranked a week.

replies.body:
Deutsches Forum, das Englische ist hier zu erreichen: http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/

German Boards, the english boards are here: http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/
